name: catachresis
text: It is "Hibernian", singular, not "Hibernians", Philippe. It is OK though, you were trying hard and having fun! Good!

name: laikalost
text:
Give him a break, he's 5!
...and an otter.

name: canusdivinus
text: He specifically made about 2/3 of his post giving Philippe "a break", laikalost. It is OK though, you were typing hard and having qualms! Good! (parody of original post)

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by hemostat, butts, NeoNaoNeo, d3lvn, Ebessan)

name: ford
text: I don't think it's possible to be on either side of this debate without sounding like a douche

name: tekende
text: Not if you're soticoto, no.

name: notcool
text: I know it's not his name, but every time I see it I still want to hear 'Solicito' in my head.

name: scrumpton
text: I don't know why but I always pictured Philippe as being smaller in comparison to humans.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Well, when he was younger, definitely.  But he's five now.

name: belgand
text:
!!!
I'm gonna chib you right!

HEARTS!!

name: sargasm
text: "All of the players had good luck and they won the game" is how I describe any sporting event to anyone who asks me about it.

name: heccibiggs
text: Regardless of whether they won or lost, I hope.

name: aliiis
text: ALL of the players won the game. They ALL won.

name: greenkoolayd
text: thats the kinda thing sportsmanship they teach kids nowadays.  "everyone gets a turn at bat because its fair."  and "we dont keep score because we dont want to emotionally scar the kids who arent so athletic".

name: fuckalgebra
text: Riding around Scotland on a penny-farthing seems like just the kind of thing Philippe would enjoy. Remember, this is the kid who learned how to use a Red Box and immediately called his mom.

name: hereward
text: I wonder if Philippe now graffitis 'HIBS' with the guts of flies he has just killed in public bathrooms, now that he is an official fan?

name: greenkoolayd
text: thats effing gross.

name: gigs
text: Oh god, bottom-left panel. How is this strip not rated higher?

name: king-jim
text: Easter Road is a dump.

name: mattylite
text: It never ceases to amaze me how long it took people to invent the bicycle chain. I mean, for real, people fuckin' rode those things. Unreal.

name: fineoakstructure
text: So you don't like the old time bikes, eh?

name: theguitarhero
text: PENNY FARTHINGS ARE NOT A CRIME.

name: tellumo
text: Someone should show up to Critical Mass on one of those things.

name: greenkoolayd
text: someone should show up to the x-games on one of those things.

name: westerberg
text: Onstad is a hibee?!?!
